name: bitcann
description: Bitcoin Cash for Assigned Names and Numbers

scripts.start: npm run compile:registry && npm run compile:registrationauction && npm run compile:bid && npm run compile:registrationconflict && npm run compile:revealname && npm run compile:illegalregistration && node index.js
scripts.compile: npm run compile:registry && npm run compile:domain && npm run compile:registrationauction && npm run compile:bid && npm run compile:resolveauction && npm run compile:removeillegal && npm run compile:registrationconflict && npm run compile:revealname && npm run compile:illegalregistration
